title: Teen Handcuffed After AI Mistakes Chip Bag for Gun
description: Prompting community outrage, police handcuffed and searched a student at a Baltimore County, Maryland, high school this week after an artificial intelligence-driven security system mistook an empty bag of Doritos for a possible gun.

title: The Vatican’s voice of reason on AI
description: PARIS — With artificial intelligence (AI) knocking us from our bearings, many are wondering what place humans will have in a technological revolution that is already underway.
